unnormalised: **Environmental News Flash: Renewable Energy on the Rise in India!**
normalised: **Environmental News Flash: Renewable Energy on the Rise in India!**

unnormalised: Hey folks, big news coming out of the energy sector! India's commitment to renewable energy is really heating up, much like that chai on a Delhi summer day.
normalised: Hey folks, big news coming out of the energy sector! India's commitment to renewable energy is really heating up, much like that chai on a Delhi summer day.

unnormalised: Dr. Sharma, a leading researcher at IIT Bombay, recently announced a breakthrough in solar panel efficiency. Apparently, they've managed to boost energy generation by 15% using a new material!
normalised: Doctor Sharma, a leading researcher at I I T Bombay, recently announced a breakthrough in solar panel efficiency. Apparently, they've managed to boost energy generation by fifteen percent using a new material!

unnormalised: This comes just as the Rajasthan government unveiled plans for a massive new solar park spanning 500 sq km near Jodhpur. Estimated cost? A cool Rs. 20,000 crore.
normalised: This comes just as the Rajasthan government unveiled plans for a massive new solar park spanning five hundred square kilometer near Jodhpur. Estimated cost? A cool rupee twenty thousand crore.

unnormalised: The project aims to power millions of homes and businesses, helping to reduce reliance on coal and bring cleaner air to our cities. It's all part of India's pledge to achieve net-zero emissions.
normalised: The project aims to power millions of homes and businesses, helping to reduce reliance on coal and bring cleaner air to our cities. It's all part of India's pledge to achieve net-zero emissions.

unnormalised: Experts say this is a game-changer and could pave the way for even more investment in renewable energy sources like wind and hydro. Every little bit helps in the fight against climate change, right? Time to celebrate with some lassi!
normalised: Experts say this is a game-changer and could pave the way for even more investment in renewable energy sources like wind and hydro. Every little bit helps in the fight against climate change, right? Time to celebrate with some lassi!
